ygData.subject: RE: Are we Hybrids?
ygData.msgSnippet: *raised eyebrow* What are you trying to employ about the female adventurers??? Faesong, lvl 15 Songweaver of SOlusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, TEst
ygData.messageBody:
*raised eyebrow*
What are you trying to employ about the female adventurers???

Faesong, lvl 15 Songweaver of SOlusek Ro, Mythical Alliance, TEst

>-----Original Message-----
>From: Mike.Langlois@... [mailto:Mike.Langlois@...]
>Sent: Friday, January 21, 2000 9:51 AM
>To: eqbards@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Are we Hybrids?
>
>
>From: Mike.Langlois@...
>
>
>
>I can only chat up the barkeeps and Innkeepers. Because they're
>the only real
>women in Norrath :P
>
>Um, except my wife...who I hope doesn't see this...
>
>Golias, Sol Ro
>
>==========
>You forgot my favorite time slice, and that's chatting up the women.
> I put aside an hour or two each day to sing to all the girls, and
> tell the tales of Harmonic who single handedly defeated Cazic Thule,
> how he slashed Maestro with his 6-note blade, how he can solo the Lord
> Room with his helmet visor down.
>
> Now that's quality time.
>
> Harmonic.
>
>
>
